name: unchartedterritory
description: Fullstack TypeScript project with optimized CI/CD

scripts.build:frontend-worker: tsc src/frontend-worker.ts --outDir dist --target ES2022 --moduleResolution bundler --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --lib ES2022 --skipLibCheck
scripts.dev:local: concurrently "npm run dev:worker" "npm run dev:frontend-worker" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && wrangler deploy --config ../wrangler-frontend.toml
scripts.deploy:frontend-staging: cd frontend && npm run build && wrangler deploy --config ../wrangler-frontend.toml --name unchartedterritory-frontend-pr-${PR_NUMBER:-dev} --env staging
scripts.test:workers: npm run build:worker && npm run build:frontend-worker && vitest run --config vitest.workers.config.ts
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test
